entity.name: course
entity.query: select id, 'course' as type, name, detail, code, collegeId from Course where isWebVisible=1
entity.deltaImportQuery: select id, 'course' as type, name, detail, code, collegeId from Course where id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from Course where isWebVisible=1 and modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: courseClass
entity.query: select cc.id as id, cc.feeExGst as pr, cc.code as code, cc.endDate as end from CourseClass cc where cc.isWebVisible=1 and cc.courseid='${course.id}' and cc.isCancelled=0 and cc.endDate > CURDATE()
entity.deltaImportQuery: select cc.id as id, cc.feeExGst as pr from CourseClass cc where cc.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from CourseClass where isWebVisible=1 and modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' or endDate < CURDATE()
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select id from Course where id='{courseClass.courseId}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: select id from CourseClass where endDate < CURDATE()

entity.name: contact
entity.query: select ct.id as id, ct.givenName as gvName, ct.familyName as fmName from Contact ct inner join Tutor t on ct.tutorId = t.id inner join TutorRole tr on t.id = tr.tutorId where tr.courseClassId='${courseClass.id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select ct.id as id, ct.givenName as gvName, ct.familyName as fmName from Contact ct where ct.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select ct.id from Contact ct where ct.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select cc.id from Contact ct inner join Tutor t on ct.tutorId = t.id inner join TutorRole tr on t.id = tr.tutorId inner join CourseClass cc on tr.courseClassId = cc.id where ct.id='${contact.id}'

entity.name: course_session
entity.query: select distinct lower(dayname(s.startDate)) as dayName, IF(DAYOFWEEK(s.startDate) in (1,7), 'weekend', 'weekday') as dayType, IF(HOUR(s.startDate) > 6 and HOUR(s.startDate) < 17, 'day', 'evening') as time from Session s where s.courseClassId='${courseClass.id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select s.id as id, lower(dayname(s.startDate)) as dayName, IF(DAYOFWEEK(s.startDate) in (1,7), 'weekend', 'weekday') as dayType, IF(HOUR(s.startDate) > 6 and HOUR(s.startDate) < 17, 'day', 'evening') as time, s.endDate as end from Session s where s.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from Session where modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select cc.id as id from Session s inner join CourseClass cc on s.courseClassId = cc.id where s.id='${course_session.id}'

entity.name: site
entity.query: select s.id as id, s.suburb as sb, s.postcode as pc, lower(CONCAT(s.suburb, ' ', s.postcode)) as subpost, CONCAT(CAST(s.latitude AS CHAR), ',', CAST(s.longitude AS CHAR)) as loc from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.roomId=r.id where s.isWebVisible=1 and cc.id='${courseClass.id}' group by s.suburb, s.postcode union select s.id as id, s.suburb as sb, s.postcode as pc, lower(CONCAT(s.suburb, ' ', s.postcode)) as subpost, CONCAT(CAST(s.latitude AS CHAR), ',', CAST(s.longitude AS CHAR)) as loc from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join Session ss on ss.roomId=r.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.id=ss.courseClassId where s.isWebVisible=1 and cc.id='${courseClass.id}' group by s.suburb, s.postcode
entity.deltaImportQuery: select s.id, s.suburb as sb, s.postcode as pc, lower(CONCAT(s.suburb, ' ', s.postcode)) as subpost, CONCAT(CAST(s.latitude AS CHAR), ',', CAST(s.longitude AS CHAR)) as loc from Site s where s.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from Site where isWebVisible=1 and modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select cc.id from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.roomId=r.id where s.id='${site.id}' union select cc.id from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join Session ss on ss.roomId=r.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.id=ss.courseClassId where s.id='${site.id}'

entity.name: coursetag
entity.query: select t.id as id, t.id as tagId from Tag t inner join TaggableTag tgt on tgt.tagId=t.id inner join Taggable tg on tgt.taggableId = tg.id where t.isWebVisible=1 and tg.entityIdentifier = 'Course' and tg.entityWillowId = '${course.id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select t.id as id, t.id as tagId from Tag t where t.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select t.id as id from Tag t inner join TaggableTag tgt on tgt.tagId=t.id inner join Taggable tg on tgt.taggableId = tg.id where t.isWebVisible=1 and tg.entityIdentifier = 'Course' and t.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' or tgt.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' or tg.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select tg.id as id from Tag t inner join TaggableTag tgt on tgt.tagId=t.id inner join Taggable tg on tgt.taggableId = tg.id where t.id=${coursetag.id}
